hotels.title: Colombia: Charming Bogota Sofitel Stay with Onsite Restaurant, Bar & Spa
hotels.description: Step into sophisticated comfort at Sofitel Bogota Victoria Regia, where French elegance meets Colombian warmth in the heart of the capital. This gem offers comfortable rooms with modern amenities, plus the acclaimed Basilic Restaurant serving local Colombian cuisine. Unwind at Bar Basilic with a craft cocktail or rejuvenate in the massage parlour. Perched 2,600 metres above sea level in trendy Zona Rosa, you're a stone's throw from Zona T's restaurant and bar scene. Stroll through leafy Parque Virrey, explore colourful La Candelaria's street art, or delve into history at the National Museum of Colombia. Here, you're perfectly positioned to experience Bogota's culture and world-class gastronomy.
